TimeZone Class Reference

This header file defines TimeZone. More...

#include <TimeZone.h>

Detailed Description

This header file defines TimeZone. 

       gaia::base::String* pattern = new gaia::base::String("Europe/Paris");
       TimeZone* timezone1 = new TimeZone(1000, *pattern, 10,1,1,0,10,-1,1,0);
       TimeZone* timezone2 = new TimeZone(1000, *pattern, 10,1,1,0,10,-1,1,0,1000*60*60);
       TimeZone* timezone3 = new TimeZone(1000, *pattern, 10,1,1,0,0x7fffffff,10,-1,1,0,0x80000000,1000*60*60);
       TimeZone* timezone = new TimeZone(1, "Europe/Paris");
       if (timezone)
       {
           printf("%s","instance create succ.\n");

           timezone->setDSTSavings(55);
           timezone->setRawOffset(58);

           printf("...getDSTSavings is %d.\n",timezone->getDSTSavings());
           printf("...getRawOffset is %d.\n",timezone->getRawOffset());
           printf("...getOffset is %d.\n",timezone->getOffset(12121212));
           printf("...getOffset is %d.\n",timezone->getOffset(1, 2099, 01, 1, 5, 0));

           if(timezone->useDaylightTime())
           {
              printf("It is useDaylightTime.\n");
           }

           timezone->setEndRule(2,2,0);
           timezone->setEndRule(2,2,2,0);
           timezone->setEndRule(2,2,2,0,true);
           timezone->setStartRule(2,2,0);
           timezone->setStartRule(2,2,2,0);
           timezone->setStartRule(2,2,2,0,true);
           timezone->setStartYear(1587);
           delete timezone;
           timezone = NULL;
       }
       else
       {
           printf("%s","instance create field.\n");
       }
